name: @nestjs/atomic-queues
description: A plug-and-play NestJS library for atomic process handling per entity with BullMQ, Redis distributed locking, and dynamic worker management

scripts.copy-package: node -e "const p=require('./package.json'); p.main='index.js'; p.types='index.d.ts'; p.files=['**/*.js','**/*.d.ts','**/*.js.map','**/*.d.ts.map']; require('fs').writeFileSync('./dist/package.json', JSON.stringify(p, null, 2));"
scripts.print:local:instructions: FOLDER=$(echo "$PWD"/atomicqueues-core*.tgz) && echo 'Reinstall with -> npm uninstall @atomicqueues/core && npm i file:'"$FOLDER"
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run copy-package && cd dist && npm pack --ignore-scripts && npm run print:local:instructions
